text: General hardware shop better stocked than some at Pioneer. Helpful staffs.
The staff were helpful and can't get into the shop to view what needed. Maybe in future, would want to have a good look around inside the shop.
Variety of goods, also good service. Can be crowded at times.
Wide range of products sold here. Pretty good quality from King Tony.
One stop hardware shop for your need at Tuas far most area...
